wikipedia_page.main: John Purdy (born 1948 in Tullylish, County Down) is a former Irish sportsman. He played Gaelic football with his local club Lawrencetown and was a member of the Down senior inter-county team from the 1960s until the 1970s, winning an All-Ireland medal in 1968.

response: * John Purdy (chess player) (1935–2011), Australian chess champion
* John Purdy (hydrographer) (1773–1843), English compiler of naval charts
